name: Celeron token
description: Celeron is an omni-chain yield aggregator built on EVM infrastructure, designed to optimize and auto-compound passive returns on ERC-20 assets with precision and cost-efficiency. The protocol enhances yield sustainability by incorporating Protocol-Owned Liquidity (POL) incentives, which help stabilize earnings and mitigate market volatility. Utilizing advanced smart contract automation and cross-chain interoperability, Celeron ensures efficient capital deployment and maximized returns. Its native tokenomics framework supports long-term ecosystem growth, making it a reliable solution for decentralized yield optimization.
